a, b = map(int, input().split())

print(max(a+b, a-b, a*b))

A, B = map(int, input().split())
ans = A + B
if A - B > ans:
    ans = A - B
if A * B > ans:
    ans = A * B
print(ans)

# Solution 1
a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(max(a+b, a-b, a*b))

# Solution 2
a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(max([a+b, a-b, a*b]))

a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(max(a+b, a-b, a*b))
